def foo():
    global global_loaded
    global_loaded()
def method():
    a = 10
    b = 20
    c = 20
success, result = insert_code(method.__code__, foo.__code__, method.
    __code__.co_firstlineno + 1)
assert success
assert list(result.co_lnotab) == [10, 1, 4, 1, 4, 1]
success, result = insert_code(method.__code__, foo.__code__, method.
    __code__.co_firstlineno + 2)
assert success
assert list(result.co_lnotab) == [0, 1, 14, 1, 4, 1]
success, result = insert_code(method.__code__, foo.__code__, method.
    __code__.co_firstlineno + 3)
assert success
assert list(result.co_lnotab) == [0, 1, 4, 1, 14, 1]
